headline.main: Who's a Good Dog? The Tennis Ball Retrievers at Brazil Open
headline.print_headline: Who's a Good Dog? The Tennis Ball Retrievers at Brazil Open

lead_paragraph: Six shelter dogs looking to be adopted are playing fetch at the Brazil Open in Sao Paulo, giving tennis fans a demonstration of their ball-retrieving skills.
snippet: Six shelter dogs looking to be adopted are playing fetch at the Brazil Open in Sao Paulo, giving tennis fans a demonstration of their ball-retrieving skills....
